message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be valuable to you. I think a fair opening price would be $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can't pay more than $11,000 for it. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I can only afford to pay up to $11,500 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my budget.
